Projects

Hydrogen Cooling Coil Bender

Autodesk Inventor CAD Weldment Drawings Mechanical Installations Shaft Sizing

Designing a machine for making gas cooling coils out of steel tubes.

The Bloomba: An autonomous plant-watering robot demonstration

Leadership ROS2/Linux programming Python Programming Computer Vision Project Management

Team leader for an autonomous plant watering robot project (Final Year Capstone Thesis). It uses a LIDAR sensor to measure its surroundings and a SLAM algorithm to navigate. We also built a custom watering arm to water pots that are placed up to 130 cm high. To accurately locate the plant pots, it can also use computer vision to identify April Tags placed on the pots.

Low Cost Endoscope for Robotic Surgery

Research & Development 3D Printing Optics Camera Hardware

A low cost digital imaging tool using the dVRK Rod Lens.

Ping Pong Ball Launcher Product Design

Product Design Fusion 360 CAD R&D Design of Experiment 3D Printing

Designing a for teaching STEM concepts to children using a ping-pong launcher.

PMMA Weight Optimization Project

FEA/FEM Topology Optimization Solidworks CAD Mechanics of Solids

Optimizing the strength of a PMMA part using the minimum amount of material.

FEA/FEM Topology Optimization Solidworks CAD Mechanics of Solids

Optimizing the strength of a PMMA part using the minimum amount of material.

3D Printing an MRI Brain Scan

3D Printing 3D Slicer MeshMixer

A friend of mine got an MRI of their brain so I offered to 3D print it for them.
